text: Mary Christine Brockert (5 March 1956 – 26 December 2010), known by her stage name Teena Marie, was an American singer, songwriter, and producer. She is famous for songs such as "Lovergirl" and "Square Biz". Teena died on December 26, 2010 at age 54, from natural causes. ==Discography== *Wild and Peaceful (1979) *Lady T (1980) *Irons in the Fire (1980) *It Must Be Magic (1981) *Robbery (1983) *Starchild (1984) *Emerald City (1986) *Naked to the World (1988) *Ivory (1990) *Passion Play (1994) *La Doña (2004) *Sapphire (2006) *Congo Square (2009) ==References== Category:1956 births Category:2010 deaths Category:Singer-songwriters from California Category:Musicians from Santa Monica, California Category:American R&B; singers Category:American soul singers Category:American funk singers Category:American blue-eyed soul singers Category:American hip hop singers Category:American jazz singers
title: Teena Marie
